topic: Bad Bunny piles on Puerto Rican patriotism at Super Bowl half-time show
summary: Puerto Rican artist Bad Bunny made history with his entirely Spanish set on the sporting world's biggest stage.
transcript:
[OPENING]
Welcome listeners to Ovi English School. Today, we will talk about a famous singer named Bad Bunny and his special performance at the Super Bowl. He sang all his songs in Spanish and showed love for Puerto Rico. Here is a question for you: What language did Bad Bunny use in his Super Bowl performance? Think about it. I will give you the answer at the end of the episode. We have a free study guide for todayâ€™s lesson. You can find the link in the description. It has vocabulary lists, exercises, and practice questions.
[VOCABULARY]
WORD: artist  
DEFINITION: a person who creates music, paintings, or other art  
EXAMPLE: The artist painted a big picture of the city. Can you say it? artist. Great job!

WORD: history  
DEFINITION: important events from the past  
EXAMPLE: She learned about the history of her country in school. Can you say it? history. Great job!

WORD: entire  
DEFINITION: whole or complete  
EXAMPLE: I ate the entire cake by myself. Can you say it? entire. Great job!

WORD: stage  
DEFINITION: a place where people perform in front of an audience  
EXAMPLE: The children sang on the stage at school. Can you say it? stage. Great job!

WORD: patriotic  
DEFINITION: showing love and pride for your country  
EXAMPLE: He wore a flag shirt to show he was patriotic. Can you say it? patriotic. Great job!

Listen for these words in todayâ€™s story!
[NEWS STORY]
Bad Bunny is a famous artist from Puerto Rico. Remember our word artist? It means a person who makes music or art. He made history at the Super Bowl this year. History means important events from the past. The Super Bowl is a very big American football game. Many people watch it on TV. It is one of the most popular sports events in the United States.

Bad Bunny performed his entire show in Spanish. Entire means whole or complete. So, he sang all his songs in Spanish. This was the first time ever that someone did this at the Super Bowl. The Super Bowl half-time show is a special time when musicians sing on stage. Stage means a place where people perform. Many famous musicians perform there.

Bad Bunny showed he is very patriotic. Patriotic means showing love and pride for your country. He wore clothes with the Puerto Rican flag and talked about his home, Puerto Rico. Many people liked how he celebrated his culture. Celebrate means to show happiness for something special.

This performance was important because it showed the power of music and culture. Bad Bunny made many people proud. He showed that you can be proud of your language and country. This was a big moment in history for Puerto Rico and for Spanish speakers around the world.
[REVIEW]
Remember the word artist? In our story, Bad Bunny is a very famous artist who sings songs. The word history is important because Bad Bunny made history by being the first to sing all in Spanish at the Super Bowl. We used the word entire to explain that he sang the entire show in Spanish. The word stage is where Bad Bunny performed during the Super Bowl half-time. Finally, patriotic describes how Bad Bunny showed love for Puerto Rico during his performance. These words help us understand the story better.
[PRACTICE]
QUESTION: Who is Bad Bunny?  
Think about your answer.  
ANSWER: Bad Bunny is a famous artist from Puerto Rico. Did you get it right? Great job!

QUESTION: What language did Bad Bunny use for his entire performance?  
Think about your answer.  
ANSWER: Bad Bunny used Spanish for his entire performance. That is correct!

QUESTION: What does patriotic mean in the story?  
Think about your answer.  
ANSWER: Patriotic means showing love and pride for your country. Did you get it right? Great job!
[CLOSING]
Remember my question at the beginning? The answer is Spanish. Did you guess correctly? Today you learned about Bad Bunny, the artist who made history by singing his entire show in Spanish on the Super Bowl stage. You also learned that patriotic means showing love for your country. If you want to practice more, check the study guide. The link is in the description below. You will find vocabulary lists, exercises, and more. Thank you for learning with Ovi English School. Come back tomorrow for more English learning with real news. Every day you practice, your English gets better! Goodbye!
